description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Galileo: Creativity as Rebellion.

discovery.text: His creative leap wasn't the telescope. It was using empirical observation to challenge 1,500 years of authority.

twist.text: The Inquisition convicted him of heresy. He spent his final years under house arrest, blind but still writing.

punchline.text: Creativity without courage is just a thought exercise.
